product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaWe're Even Hydrating Longwear Concealer
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeDo less, but get more with We're Even Hydrating Longwear Concealer, the ultimate makeup-meets-skincare hack. It melts into skin, instantly evening, brightening and hiding dark circles + puffiness for up to 12 hours. Available in 50 buildable medium coverage shades with a second-skin finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsBuildable medium coverage with a natural, second-skin finishExtreme longwear formula that resists creasing, fading, sweat + humidityHydrates + brightens instantly and through 12 hoursâ€”continues to improve with consistent useVisibly improves dark circles + puffiness instantly and through 12 hoursâ€”continues to improve with consistent useWon't settle into fine lines or accentuate skin textureTransfer-proof + waterproofNo flashback + noncomedogenicKey IngredientsPersian Silk Tree Extract to help target signs of fatigue around the eyesSodium Hyaluronate to help hydrate and conditionPrickly Pear Cactus Extract, a humectant that attracts moistureItem 2618097How To UseFinding your shade match made easyStart with your Pro Filt'r #If you don't know your Pro Filt'r #, start with your shade familyUse your undertone as a guide (W = warm, N= neutral, C= cool)Swatch at least three shades + choose the shade that best matches your skin tone. Go lighter if you want tobrighten.If you are unable to swatch, check out our shade swatches onlineHow to applyDot or swipe formula anywhere you want to conceal and brighten...think under eyes, blemishes, or all over.Blend with Precision Concealer Brush 180, fingers or sponge (best for all-over coverage)Pro Tip: If you have oily skin, set with Invisimatte Instant Setting + Blotting PowderIngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Caprylyl Methicone, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Undecane, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Glycerin, Propanediol, Tridecane, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Saccharomyces Ferment, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Shorea Robusta Resin, Sodium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Octyldodecanol, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Hexyl Dimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Propylene Carbonate, Lauroyl Lysine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Finding your shade match made easyStart with your Pro Filt'r #If you don't know your Pro Filt'r #, start with your shade familyUse your undertone as a guide (W = warm, N= neutral, C= cool)Swatch at least three shades + choose the shade that best matches your skin tone. Go lighter if you want tobrighten.If you are unable to swatch, check out our shade swatches onlineHow to applyDot or swipe formula anywhere you want to conceal and brighten...think under eyes, blemishes, or all over.Blend with Precision Concealer Brush 180, fingers or sponge (best for all-over coverage)Pro Tip: If you have oily skin, set with Invisimatte Instant Setting + Blotting Powder

reviews.headline: GOODBYE Dark Circles!!
reviews.comments: Not only did this concealer cover up my dark circles without color corrector, it also is lightweight. The coverage is beautiful it left my under eyes nice and bright but also super hydrated! It's a nice product and it's one where a little goes a long way, just a few dots under the eyes really does wonders.

reviews.headline: Fabulous
reviews.comments: Was as hydrating as described and was actually light enough for a pale skinned girly

reviews.headline: MJ
reviews.comments:
I love the Fenty concealer! It's so lightweight, buildable, and gives a natural-looking finish. It's perfect for daytime activities like breakfast, going to the gym, or running errands. If you're looking for something with full coverage for a night out, you might need a heavier formula, but for everyday wear, this is fantastic.

The only downside is the priceâ€”it's a bit on the higher side, and you could find heavier coverage options in the same range. That said, the color range is wide, it's hydrating, and overall, I've had a very positive experience with Fenty products. I'd definitely use it again!

reviews.headline: becoming my holy grail all-over concealer!
reviews.comments:
I'm extremely picky with concealers because of my combination skin. This one works just as well under the eyes as it does on spots. The shade range is amazing too, I'm thinking about getting another shade to better match the rest of my face, as I primarily use it under my eyes. 

It says it's a hydrating formula, to which I would say it's just not drying like other concealers can be. It layers very well over itself and can be built up to full coverage, although one layer will do you just fine with the right tools and prep. It wears comfortably and by the end of the day, it's still on somehow!

reviews.headline: My go to concealer
reviews.comments: i have really dry under eyes this concealer is perfect with the hydrating foundation

reviews.headline: vey good
reviews.comments: i really like it although it creased a little bit but i didnt use setting powder so it might be that. other than that its very cute

reviews.headline: A hidden gem
reviews.comments: I feel like everyone forgot about this concealer, but I still love it. This is my second bottle. It's super thin and has a light to medium coverage. It's not crease proof, which is fine because nothing truly is. It also doesn't look dry and cakey as I've experienced with the Haus Labs and Hourglass concealers. I use shade 175w. If you're my shade twin I use the Fenty matte foundation in 185, about-face foundation in L2neutral, Too Faced born this way foundation in Warm Nude, Haus Labs concealer shade 11 and foundation shade 100, and the Hourglass concealer in Silk.

reviews.headline: Definitely would buy again
reviews.comments: Longlasting and keeps skin hydrated

reviews.headline: bad
reviews.comments: poor coverage and consistency. smells like crayon so bad also

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: It is king wear and so smooth to put on

reviews.headline: This is the second time I bought it
reviews.comments: Great coverage!!

reviews.headline: So comfortable!
reviews.comments: It's very light on the face, its not remotely heavy but there's still coverage. Actually has pink undertones which I love!

reviews.headline: Allergic Reaction
reviews.comments:
I loved the look of the concealer but I've had a reaction under my eyes every time. ðŸ˜­ 
I went to Reddit to see if others had the same and my God!!Everyone there did too and it's because it has silicon in it. Everyone recommended Kosas as a replacement so I'll be trying that.

My poor undereyes hurt so badly.

reviews.headline: not for dry under eyes
reviews.comments: I am not sure what it was about this concealer, but it creased and was so dry underneath my eyes no matter what skin prep I did beforehand. I love fenty but this was not it

reviews.headline: A new must have!!
reviews.comments: I love this concealer shade 400n has the best neutral undertone! I blend with a brush and it looks just like skin! Sets beautifully with a pressed powder. Very minimal creasing

reviews.headline: Super Hydrating
reviews.comments: So far, I'd say the Fenty Hydrating Concealer blends seamlessly into my skin and doesn't cause breakouts. I will say it doesn't provide full coverage like high-end concealers.

reviews.headline: Like this, but creases
reviews.comments: In general, I like this concealer a lot.  Shade is a perfect match, coverage is super natural, and blends out really nicely.  My main gripe is that it settles into my undereye and eyelid creases instantly, and I can't seem to crack the code to stop it.  I've tried blending with brush vs finger, setting with powder, etc.  I don't wear primer but recently bought some, so I'm curious if that'll help.  Undereye is really the only place I experience this, and it covers everything else really nicely and lasts well.

reviews.headline: Not that special
reviews.comments: It is definitely not crease proof and it is definitely not transfer proof. It creases even if I set it with powder. Nice formula but not wowed. If you're oily go with pro filtr

reviews.headline: I will continue to use this product
reviews.comments: Great concealer for me

reviews.headline: Great concealer
reviews.comments:
This concealer is the best!
 It is very light yet covers very well and does not get in your facial lines. It's definitely an upgrade for me.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Having tried numerous foundations in the past, I can confidently say that Fenty Foundation stands out from the crowd. Here's why:

*Unmatched Performance: Fenty Foundation boasts an exceptional formula that effortlessly blends into the skin, providing a flawless and natural-looking finish. Unlike other products, it offers buildable coverage that caters to various skin tones and types, ensuring a perfect match for everyone.

*Inclusive Shade Range: One of the standout benefits of owning Fenty Foundation is its extensive range of shades. With an impressive 50 shades to choose from, Fenty Beauty has set a new standard for inclusivity in the beauty industry, making it easier for individuals of all skin tones to find their ideal match.

*Long-lasting Wear: This foundation delivers long-lasting wear without feeling heavy or cakey on the skin. It stays put throughout the day, providing a smooth and even complexion that withstands humidity and sweat, making it perfect for all-day wear.

*Exceptional Coverage: Fenty Foundation excels in its ability to provide excellent coverage for imperfections, blemishes, and uneven skin tone. It effortlessly blurs out any flaws, leaving the skin looking flawless and radiant.

*Cruelty-free and Vegan: For those conscious about their beauty choices, Fenty Foundation is a fantastic option. It is cruelty-free and vegan, making it a guilt-free addition to your beauty routine.

As for whether I would buy this product, the answer is a resounding yes! The Fenty Foundation has become a staple in my makeup collection, and I can't imagine going without it. Its performance, shade range, and longevity make it a worthwhile investment.

Not only would I recommend this product to my friends and family, but I often find myself raving about it. Its versatility and ability to cater to a diverse range of skin tones make it a must-have for anyone seeking a high-quality foundation that delivers exceptional results.
faceoff_positive.headline: Sooo good!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Someone recommended this for me, and while the shade match is ON POINT. Its not good for my undereys. Its a super dry and unfortunately I have dry undereyes that love to absorb product. 

After hydrating my face, and using the Ulta Brand settinf spray, I was able to hydrate it to get it to work and to get the look I was expecting from it. 

I don't think I will be repurchasing this product, because I feel like I get the same coverage from the NYX new stick color corectors and concealers- and they're more budget friendly. I was really hoping this was going to do wonders, but it really lacked for me.

Do not purchase if you have dry skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not good for dry skin girlies
